text: Kare wa anata gata o hitotsu no tamashī kara tsukuri, sorekara sono haigūsha o tsukuri, mata kare wa 8-tō no kachiku o shiyū de anata gata ni tsukawasa reta. Kare wa anata gata o haha no tainai ni tsukura re, 3ttsu no ankoku no naka ni oite, sōzō ni tsugu sōzō o nasa reta. Ko no yō ni, anata gata no shu arrā ni taiken wa zokusuru. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu.Nanoni anata gata wa dōshite somuki saru no ka
